metadata.name: WAV3 TAPE Vol. 1 - Kaien Cruz - DDD (bonus track)
metadata.description:
WAV3 TAPE vol. 1 

25 musicians, 25 songs, 25 nfts

Kaien Cruz - DDD (bonus track) 

This was the first track that Kaien Cruz made when they moved to the USA <3

About Kaien Cruz - Kaien Cruz is a 23 year old Pop, R&B Singer/songwriter from South Africa. Their first single ever ‘Love Me In The Dark’, rose into the top charts, getting nominated for Song of the Year at the SAMA. Kaien then had their debut performance in front of 90,000 people opening for Justin Bieber’s ‘Purpose Tour’. Inspired, Cruz made their way to LA, where they have since performed in their first US Tour, booked major festivals at SXSW & Governor’s Ball & successfully released 2 EP’s independently.

art by @yoitsbrae & @maxschramp
